ygData.subject: Alert
ygData.msgSnippet: (Just in case anyone didn t know, Yanshosh has given me Grimmler, Rex, Firearm, and a few others temporarily until he gets back from vacation)

(Just in case anyone didn't know, Yanshosh has given me Grimmler, Rex, 
Firearm, and a few others temporarily until he gets back from vacation)


Chordate/Smokescreen/Grimmler/Rex/Firearm:




A lifeless comm. transmission was sent to Chordate.

Chordate gently got away from Feline.  "Excuse me, Feline, I have to take 
care of something important." he ran off for the bridge.

---

Chordate entered the brig, looking over the scanners quickly.  A flame 
retardent device had been plugged.  It wouldn't do much.  Not enough for his 
concern.  

Activating his comm. to the Maximals outside the door BrightBlade was in, he 
gave himself a little chuckle for being so slagging clever.  Even if the 
intruder got away, he could merely change all the codes making that part of 
what they had learned useless.  Not to mention, now, he would just leave the 
security measures on in the air venting system, making them unaccessable.

"All Maximals waiting outside of the intruder's door," he spoke into his 
comm. unit, "it's Chordate.  Motion detectors are detecting movement in the 
water.  With the sprinklers and foam retardent on, you will be able to see 
where the intruder is at, abling you too shoot at it.  Sprinkler systems will 
be activated in the halls, as well as autoguns, so you will have cover fire 
if the assailant runs.  I will be manually controlling the autoguns.  Move 
in, now!" he yelled, pressing a button, the Bright Blade's door unsealing.

---

Firearm, the cannon on his left arm set to rapid fire, stepped forward, the 
door of the room opening automatically as it sensed his movement.  Firearm 
ignored water that poured out of the room, and the autoguns that came out of 
the cieling in the halls.  He raised his cannon, seeing the outline of a 
person, the sprinklers showing where the person was (not to mention some foam 
was on the assailant, though the sprinklers would've washed most of it off, 
and then there's the outline of Bright Blade's feet in the water.

Firearm charged, firing off 10 rapid plasma blasts at the intruder's outlined 
chest.


Rex looked to Skulletron.  "I'm going in, wait here with him." he said, 
tilting his head to Smokescreen.  "If the person comes, open fire!" he 
yelled, running into the room, firing off a few laser bolts at the area of 
the knees, that low, the sprinklers didn't help that much.  "Give it up, or 
you're history!" Rex yelled to the unknown intruder.


Smokescreen nodded, looking up as water poured down his face, more sprinklers 
coming on.  He raised his electro-disruptor rifle.  This was going to be 
interesting.  Definately.

Grimmler rushed into the room, looking for a target.
